directions: In a large saucepan of boiling water cook shrimp with salt and crab-boil spices until just cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes. Drain shrimp and transfer to a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together vinegar, oil, pickling spices and salt and pepper to taste and add to shrimp. Add remaining ingredients and combine mixture well. Chill shrimp, covered, overnight.
ingredients: 2 pounds medium shrimp (about 64) shelled (leaving tails intact), and deveined if desired
title: Pickled Shrimp
